In Tanzania, we carry out research on rabies epidemiology, prevention and control. Our work in Tanzania has contributed to multi-country and global studies to inform policy and practice.

This website provides information from long-term contact tracing in Serengeti District, Northwest Tanzania. See below for links to our research in other parts of the country, or return to our <a href="https://rabiesresearch.shinyapps.io/shiny_hub/", target="blank">hub</a> for rabies research in other parts of the world:
